Overview of Student Addresses at NC State University
NC State University collects and maintains student addresses to ensure accurate records, proper communication, and compliance with institutional and federal requirements.
NC State University gathers student address information during the admission process, and allowes students to regularly update their addresses through the MyPackstudent portal.
The university uses students' adresses to communicate importabt academic, administrative, and emergency information to students. Additionally, student addresses are used for mailing diplomas, transcripts, and other official documents.
The MyPack student portal allows students to view, verify,and update their addreses as needed. It is important for students to keep their addresses current to ensure they receive all communications from the university.
Students can access and manage all address information by selecting Student Homepage → Personal Information → Addresses in MyPack Portal. while SEVIS Local and SEVIS Foreign Addresses are required for international students.
